titles.title: Designating minority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

action.text: DEBATE - Mr. Fazio asked unanimous consent that the resolution be modified. Agreed to without objection.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Ms. Jackson-Lee moved to vacate the previous proceedings on the bill.
On motion to vacate the previous proceedings on the bill Agreed to without objection.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/20/1995--Passed House amended. Elects: (1) Representative Edward Markey to rank above Nick Joe Rahall and Patrick Kennedy on the House Committee on Resources; and (2) Representative Pete Geren to rank after Jerry Costello on the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
